channel.title: NPC's Not Spawning... and Shops not working
channel.description:
Okay... Whenever I edit my .cfg files they don't actually do anything when I compile and run. Here's what I do to edit them, maybe I edit them wrong or something: 1. I open a Notepad 2. I press 'File' 3. I click Open 4. I go into my Source through the Open thing 5. I open a .cfg File 6. The code goes into my Notepad that I opened 7. I add an Npc or Shop 8. I save the File 9. I compile 10. I run the Server (11.) I test it (12.) NOTHINGS THERE
Do I do anything wrong? If you want some of the code that I put into the .cfg files I will show u it so u can see if I did anything wrong... or if u want to see the code from any of the other files i need to edit to get an npc to appear just ask. Any help is appreciated, thanks.

@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I have added them to autospawn.cfg.

item.title: NPC's Not Spawning... and Shops not working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Okay… Whenever I edit my .cfg files they don’t actually do anything when I compile and run. Here’s what I do to edit them, maybe I edit them wrong or something:

  1. I open a Notepad
  2. I press ‘File’
  3. I click Open
  4. I go into my Source through the Open thing
  5. I open a .cfg File
  6. The code goes into my Notepad that I opened
  7. I add an Npc or Shop
  8. I save the File
  9. I compile
  10. I run the Server
    (11.) I test it
    (12.) NOTHINGS THERE

Do I do anything wrong? If you want some of the code that I put into the .cfg files I will show u it so u can see if I did anything wrong… or if u want to see the code from any of the other files i need to edit to get an npc to appear just ask. Any help is appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
